description: An easy choice for cool days. The Westlands Crew delivers just the right amount of warmth and trail to table versatility. Merino wool is blended with Seawool—a soft polyester made from recycled plastic bottles and upcyled oyster shells—to create naturally soft, sustainably comfortable yarns. The fine gauge box-stitch knit gives it texture without bulk, and the tall crewneck adds warmth without restriction.
name: Royal Robbins Westlands Crew - Mens
